reviews.sentence: GREAT FAMILY STAY. The staff was amazing they helped us with everything we needed. the rooms were very comfortable the pool very nice the water was very very comfortable especially for the kids we had a very great stay.

Last minute stay. Very nice for a quick overnight. Room was clean and comfortable. We swam at the pool and it was nice. The jets on the spa could not be turned on however. The room is good size and even though we were across from the pool the noise was not bad.
Service great pool excellent accommodations. Hotel Employee at the restaurant was best server I have had in a long time. Nothing.

Pleasant Staff Make the Difference. The helpful and friendly staff make for a comfortable stay. I liked the workout ares and pool. The hoteli is quiet. If you have business or personal reasons to stay in Derfield this is a great place to stay.
Exceptional. Extra nice staff pool clean restaurant good quiet room soft pillows. All was good.
Needs an update. Tired hotel stuck in the past. Needs a complete gut renovation. Should n’t call itself Hyat Regency more of Holiday Inn. Gym and pool are the highlights. Rooms are dated.

It was a very nice hotel they even offered us complimentary breakfast buffet coupons for free breakfast and they give you these free drinks coupons for their bar I only drink wine and that was nice to see that they offered that at their bar. My kids enjoyed the swimming pool and buffet and they have a great exercise room m the bed in room is very comfy. I loved the staff.

Very Friendly and Clean. Hotel staff was always very friendly and acomodatingI had a room next to the stairs that was very loud but overall great stay. Pool was nice work out area was nice and clean. Always had fresh towels. Lobby was always clean. Nice hotel.
Love the experience from the time i walked thru the door rooms clean nice pool and workout area and breakfast was lovely.
Smart room layout. Nice pool fitness area as well as other amenities. 2nd time here definitely one of the better ones.

overall. this hotel is very beautiful and in a great location with lots of things to do for the whole family. When I stayed there this past week I tried to workout but too many kids playing on the machines not working out so then I tried to go to the pool area and was disgusted that there was a black oily stuff in the hot tub towels all the pool side but no fresh clean towels to use. Just very dissatisfied with the whole experience.

Room location may be key. Be sure Not to stay in room 126 across from the pool. Very noisy and raucous. Unaccompanied children running wild. Noisy adults that seem completely oblivious to consideration for others. I guess that is a general reflection of the world we live in now. Power went out in the entire hotel in the middle of the night. No explanation. That was weird.

Great deal. Located next to the headquarters of a huge corporation their parking lot was a bit hard to access. The lobby was very nicely decored. The room was nice and clean. My only complain was that the TV remote was not working properly I do not use it so not a problem for me but no hair dryer in the room and I wish there was some kind of written directory of the hotel in the room. I wanted to know the location and the hours for the indoor pool but had to call the front desk to find out and no channel directory for the TV. I had to turn on the TV and find out. But overall it was a great stay.

No pool housekeeping kept banging open and closed the door to the room next to us no running water for a period of time construction on our floor and a group that thought they were the only ones there. They kept coming into the hall banging their doors yelling or talking loudly.

I was not a big fan of the half glass shower or the fact that the bathroom only had a sliding door. I found a few rips in my sheets. Overall it was a comfortable hotel and I enjoyed my stay. I wish the pool was open there was a sign that stated it was closed indefinitely. I would stay here again.

My family got a room here for a quick staycation with our son. But come to find that the pool that was advertised did n’t exist. I will say though the management did a great job and booked us into another Hyat hotel that did have a pool for no charge.

Hotel room was wonderful comfortable and clean. No pool was a bit of a let down but awesome fitness center. It was the team hotel for a soccer tournament but they were not very tolerant of the kids even sitting in the lobby without being harassed by hotel staff. Good to note hotel policy of no coolers food can be brought in from the outside. Other 4 star hotels with same price have been much more accommodating.

Really nice hotel but no pool. Everything that the hotel could control was excellent. I would just bemoan the decision to get rid of the pool which for folks traveling on business can sometimes be an important overlooked means of relaxation.
High quality room for decent rate 200 2 nights. Pool not avail tho.

No pool despite what google said. Not their fault Derfield has wonderful staff great lounge area bartender was super sweet. King room was TOP NOTCH clean bathroom was very nice and everything was just like you want it to be in a hotel escape from the real world in affordable luxury.
